### Empowering the DIB: CMMC 2.0 from Compliance to Competitiveness

#### Insights from experts on CMMC‚Äôs impact on cybersecurity and compliance.

Over 300,000 US government Defense Industrial Base (DIB) subcontractors will soon be affected by the Cybersecurity Maturity Model Certification (CMMC) framework to secure the federal supply chain. This complex framework will require all industry players to assess, prepare, execute, and certify a wide range of new security enhancements.

Now in its fifth year, interest in CMMC Day offers a comprehensive overview of new certification requirements that will apply to industry stakeholders including product developers, DIB subcontractors, integrators, testing laboratories, and end-users. CMMC Day will review NIST 800-171 and other foundational federal supply chain cybersecurity standards and best practices. Speakers will cover efforts to map existing controls and processes across several maturity levels that range from basic cyber hygiene to advanced.

CMMC Day receives extensive speaker support from NIST, NIAP, and NSA‚Äîall major players in the rollout of CMMC. The Conference brings together the entire industry value chain: product vendors, component suppliers, commercial testing laboratories, trusted integrators, standards organizations, and government agencies.

## **CMMC Day** will provide important perspectives for _anyone involved in supply chain cybersecurity_: Product Vendors, Component Suppliers, Commercial Testing Laboratories, DIB Subcontractors, Trusted Integrators, Standards Organizations, and Government Agencies

### Reserve your seat.

[Register Now](https://cmmcday.org/#register)

#### Part of DIB Certification Events 2025:

###### [![](https://cmmcday.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/CSfCLogoNameOnlyBlackOnWhite-300x58.png)](https://certinfosec.org/)  Focusing on the National Security Agency‚Äôs (NSA) program to leverage commercial hardware and software technologies certified for Common Criteria in support of national security objectives. Click [here](https://certinfosec.org/) for more info.

###### [![](https://cmmcday.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/CommoCriteria_RGB_FINAL-06_LessPadding-e1646866560167-300x91.png)](https://certinfosec.org/?page_id=19904)

###### A special-focus day presented May 5, providing industry professionals an overview of the current status and future outlook for Common Criteria, the cybersecurity framework that underpins CSfC. Learn more [here](https://certinfosec.org/?page_id=13720).

###### [![](https://cmmcday.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/DoDIN_APL_DAY_RGB_FINAL-01-Cropped-300x128.png)](https://certinfosec.org/?page_id=18306)

###### DoDIN APL Day is focused on requirements to test and certify products that affect communication and collaboration across the DoD Information Network.
